title: Latest News from Science Magazine
description: Keyword search result for Alerts: News Weekly Headlines -- New results matching your keyword search query (updated daily).

items.title: Congress set to reject Trump’s major budget cuts to NSF, NASA, and energy science
items.description: Appropriators agree instead to keep this year’s spending nearly level

items.title: Deep-sea earthquakes fuel huge plankton blooms in Antarctica
items.description: Hydrothermal vents spurred by seismic activity feed vital nutrients to Antarctic microbes

items.title: As deep-sea mining race ramps up, mission will assess whether ecosystems recover afterward
items.description: A new series of research cruises will study rare abyssal species in areas slated for mining

items.title: Blood-cleansing method faces its first test as cancer vaccine
items.description: New clinical trial aims to use whole, light-inactivated tumor cells for immunotherapy

items.title: After legal deal, NIH to review grant proposals frozen, denied, or withdrawn because of Trump directives
items.description: Agreement requires agency to evaluate hundreds of applications “in good faith” using its standard process

items.title: Is ‘open science’ delivering benefits? Major study finds proof is sparse
items.description: It’s hard to measure social and economic impacts of making papers and data free, researchers say

items.title: <cite>Science</cite>’s favorite news visuals of 2025
items.description: Our Visuals editors highlight particularly inspiring images and media

items.title: Firing of neuroscience institute chief adds to NIH’s leadership vacuum
items.description: Trump administration declines to renew appointment of Walter Koroshetz, against NIH director’s wishes

items.title: Watch tiny plankton ‘surf’ ocean currents
items.description: Microscopic creatures hitch a ride on turbulent waters to travel faster

items.title: Chemicals in million-year-old fossils reveal animals’ lives in detail
items.description: Ancient meals and infections reconstructed from preserved metabolic markers
